attributes.action: FAST TRACK entry VISA for our sudanese family members trapped in war-torn sudan
attributes.additional_details:
Sudan is a humanitarian catastrophe unfolding right infront of our eyes.
War is raging around innocent civilians who have no access to basic necessities such as food, water and medicine and the situation is rapidly deteriorating.
The UK has beautifully demonstrated its humanity when helping Ukrainians and now we need the same humanity shown to our Sudanese families.
We need the government to act now and act fast as lives are in extreme danger. The clock is ticking!
attributes.background:
We need to bring our family members to safety in the UK.
We need a FAST TRACK UK entry scheme for our Sudanese relatives as the crisis there is deteriorating rapidly. 
We are not looking to set a new precedence but rather ask for a similar scheme that was offered to Ukrainian refugees.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637279
